text: The women's 4 × 400 metres relay event at the 1978 Commonwealth Games was held on 12 August at the Commonwealth Stadium in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
